title: Round Pointed Tip Paint Brushes Set - 6 Pcs Artist Paintbrushes for Acrylic, Oil, Watercolor Painting - Premium Nylon Hair Art Paint Brush for Beginners and Professionals
features: QUALITY MATERIALS: The Fine Round Paintbrushes are made of - Premium taklon hairs has excellent softness & spring, pickup paints well and release color smoothly. Ergonomic birch wood short handles provide comfortable grip and get precise controls when cutting in & painting. Seamless aluminum ferrules firmly hold the nylon bristles inside, no loss hair provide you a nice painting experience.

ASSORTED SIZES: Set of 6 pcs Round Pointed Tip paint brushes, size 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12. Assorted sizes allow a wide coverage to detail works and give you plenty of options. It could cover all your needs and always have the right brush for painting project. You can use our artist quality brushes and can easily control what kind of stroke you want with your paintings, and you will be always filled with creative ideas while painting.

WIDE APPLICATION: Our bulk pack Art Painting Brush Set is basically suitable for all kinds of painting needs. Perfect for Watercolor, Acrylic, Oil, Gouache, Tempera painting on Art Canvas, Face, Nails, Body, Models, Rocks, Ceramic Pottery, Doll Houses. Also, for Miniatures, Detail Fine Lines, Base coating, Art Drawing, Paint by Numbers, thick and thin strokes, and other more craft DIY projects.

WONDERFUL GIFT: Genixart Paint Brush set is favored by Hobbyists, Painting Lovers, Artists, Ceramists, Fabric Painters, Crafters, Beginners and Professionals for using in school, home, office or on travel. It is a perfect gift for Students, Classmates, Adults, Friends. Also be a great gift idea on Festivals, such as Birthday, Back to School, Thanksgiving Day, Halloween, Christmas, New Year's Day, etc..

SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: We promise to provide you high quality products with excellent prices. Your satisfaction is always our highest priority, please feel free to contact us if you have any comments and suggestions about our products or services, we will help you deal with them until you are satisfied. We hope you could love our products and recommend them to your friends.
description: Genixart Artist Paint Brushes Set 6 Pcs for Acrylic Oil Watercolor Gouache Painting Materials: Premium Nylon Bristles Seamless Aluminum Ferrules Birch Wooden Handles Handle Color: Black Features: Brushes for painting, Paintbrushes set of 6. Premium nylon bristles have excellent softness & spring, pickup paints well and release color smoothly. High quality brush hair keeps its shape intactness even after multiple uses. Brush bristles return to perfect shape after each stroke, and ready for next strokes. Birch wood handles provide comfortable grip and get precise controls when cutting in & painting. Seamless Aluminum Ferrules firmly hold the nylon bristles inside, no loss hair provides you a nice painting experience. 6 different sizes, ideal for cover both detailed painting and largest coat applications needs. Suitable for all kind of painting needs basically. Perfect for Acrylic, watercolor, oil, and gouache painting. Ideal for Kids, Students, Adults, Beginners and Professionals. Nice for nail art, face and body painting as well as models, eggs, doll houses, rock painting, also paint by numbers. Package Including: What You Get: 6 pcs Artist Quality Paint Brushes in assorted sizes 1 pc size 2 1 pc size 4 1 pc size 6 1 pc size 8 1 pc size 10 1 pc size 12 Tips: For best results, soak the brush heads in water for half an hour before use. Do not allow paint to dry on brush, clean while wet with mild soap and water, Reshape with fingers. Cleaning after every use: if water-based paint, wash in warm soapy water. If oil-based paints, cleaning with solvent. Storage in correct way, the brushes could last a long time. Keep them Flatwise or head upward.
